about.en: I'm a Data & AI lead with a passion for creating practical, AI-powered cloud-based products that blend low-code and pro-code approaches. At PwC Portugal, I lead the design and implementation of Smart Products, Automation and AI integration, including Agentic AI, Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and Conversational AI/Chatbots. I am a certified Azure and Power Platform solution architect, holding 13 Microsoft certifications across multiple services. My technical background covers a wide range, including Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, Dynamics 365, Dataverse, Python, Databricks, C#/.NET, and more. I use these skills to develop scalable AI products and automate workflows that make work easier and more efficient. Beyond my professional work, I love learning. I have a Master's in Economics and Management of Science, Technology, and Innovation, and a diverse set of interests—from philosophy and history to design, photography, and astronomy. I started a Portuguese-language podcast to share insights and dive into new areas of knowledge. I'm motivated, creative, and always eager to learn more. I thrive on building AI solutions that make a difference while staying curious about the world around me.
about.pt: Sou líder de Data & IA com uma paixão por criar produtos cloud práticos com IA que combinam abordagens low-code e pro-code. Na PwC Portugal, lidero o design e a implementação de Produtos Inteligentes, Automação e integração de IA, incluindo IA Agêntica, Geração Aumentada por Recuperação (RAG) e IA Conversacional/Chatbots. Sou arquiteto de soluções certificado em Azure e Power Platform, com 13 certificações Microsoft em vários serviços. A minha formação técnica abrange várias áreas, incluindo Microsoft Power Platform, Azure, Dynamics 365, Dataverse, Python, Databricks, C#/.NET e mais. Utilizo estas competências para desenvolver produtos de IA escaláveis e automatizar fluxos de trabalho que tornam o trabalho mais fácil e eficiente. Para além do meu trabalho profissional, adoro aprender. Tenho um Mestrado em Economia e Gestão da Ciência, Tecnologia e Inovação, e um conjunto diversificado de interesses - desde filosofia e história até design, fotografia e astronomia. Criei um podcast em português para partilhar conhecimentos e explorar novas áreas de conhecimento. Sou motivado, criativo e sempre ávido por aprender mais. Destaco-me por construir soluções de IA que fazem a diferença enquanto mantenho a curiosidade sobre o mundo à minha volta.

experience.title: Product and Cloud Lead - Data & AI team
experience.description: Since January 2024, I have been at the helm of managing, designing, and implementing AI-focused, cloud-based solutions, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and integration of Large Language Models (LLMs), as a leader within PwC Portugal's Data & AI team. Our aim is to deliver top-tier AI-powered products, striking a balance between pro-code and low-code methodologies, and leveraging cloud-based deployment for scalability. I lead a team of experts, setting architectural standards and leading the orchestration of AI automation workflows. My proficiency in Microsoft Azure and Power Platform is crucial for advancing these solutions from concept to worldwide implementation.
experience.skills: Databricks, Microsoft Power Platform and +5 skills

I manage a team of specialized technical consultants within a Consulting Solutions team of about 80 professionals.

experience.title: Specialist - Consulting Solutions team
experience.description: As a Microsoft Power Platform specialist, I utilize the full suite of Power Platform tools, from Canvas Apps and Power BI reports to Power Portals/Pages and Chatbots (Virtual Agents/Copilot Studio). I integrated these solutions with Azure (e.g., Functions, Logic Apps, Data Factory & Data Lake Gen2), Microsoft 365 (e.g Teams, Outlook), Dynamics 365, SQL Server, Dataverse, and SharePoint services. In addition to this expertise, I've successfully led full-stack pro-code app development projects, overseeing them from concept to delivery. Notably, I also earned PwC Portugal's first ever Hackathon as the team leader and technical specialist. This initiative has evolved into a product that we are now beginning to sell worldwide.
